widgets.title: Requests (total)
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT rate(sum(coredns_dns_request_count_total), 5 minutes) FACET proto TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Requests (by qtype)
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT rate(sum(coredns_dns_request_type_count_total), 5 minutes) FACET type TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Requests (by zone)
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT rate(sum(coredns_dns_request_count_total), 5 minutes) FACET zone TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Responses (by rcode)
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT rate(sum(coredns_dns_response_rcode_count_total), 5 minutes) FACET rcode TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Cache (size)
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT sum(coredns_cache_size) FACET type TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Cache (hitrate)
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT rate(sum(coredns_cache_hits_total), 5 minutes) FACET type TIMESERIES

widgets.title: CoreDNS Logs
widgets.nrql: FROM Log select timestamp, message where `labels.k8s-app` = 'kube-dns'
